name: Cloud Infrastructure Engineer AWS
description:
We are looking for a Cloud Infrastructure Engineer AWS. Build and maintain a highly available AWS cloud platform, including the infrastructure required for it.

Required skills:

  • English: Upper-Intermediate;
  • Kubernetes;
  • Terraform;
  • Helm;
  • Docker;
  • AWS EKS (Kubernetes), AWS EC2;
  • AWS RDS, AWS EBS, EFS, AWS S3 Storage;
  • VPC (Virtual Private Cloud), Route53 (DNS);
  • AWS CloudWatch, Prometheus (inclusive Alertmanager) und Grafana, EFK-Stack (ElasticSearch, FluentBit, Kibana).

Our Benefits:

  • Official employment;
  • A flexible schedule, the possibility of remote work;
  • Paid time off and paid sick leave days;
  • English and German language classes;
  • Сorporate trainings, seminars, activities within internal PMO;
  • Possible business trips to customer's location;
  • For more information see our company description page.
